name: Fighting Mad Lads
description:
Fighting Mad Lads is a fast-paced party game, for two to four local players set in “Neo-City” where the rules are changing each round. It’s time to fight! Keep up with the fast pace and adapt yourself to the rules of each mini-game. Choose your street hero and destroy your friends in each game to become the King in the Streets.




1) Start a game with your friends.
2) When the game starts, elbow your friends.
3) In the middle of the game, stand in front of the screen to stop them from playing.
4) That’s it! You won!

We promise you a 100% win but we are not responsible for the loss of friendships.

Also, do not forget : No holds barred in the street.




- Local Multiplayer : Play as one of the street heroes and dive into fun and dynamic couch games in free-for-all or pair up fights in 2v2 in the streets of Neo City.
- Lots of mini games : 5 exciting mini-games alternating each round! You’ll have to adapt yourself constantly to the new rules. Will you manage to take the coin and put it in your bank in the arcade arena or will you take cover in area overload ?
- Blow up your friends : Mixing party games and fighting, don’t forget to punch your friends and jump into the action.
- Easy-to-Learn : FML is a game mixing party game and fighting mechanics but with very simple controls in a fast-paced rhythm.
- Set in a cyberpunk 3D universe mixing street art and cartoon style.
